alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Greene; Hamblen; Jefferson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 03 at 5:31PM CDT until August 03 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Cocke County in east Tennessee... Central Greene County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Hamblen County in east Tennessee... East Central Jefferson County in east Tennessee... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 631 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2.5 and 4.5 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 0.25 inches in 1 hour. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing with numerous road closures remaining. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Morristown, Greeneville, Tusculum, White Pine, Mosheim, Bulls Gap, Mohawk, Lowland, Bybee, Chucky and Davy Crockett Birthplace. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...0.25 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
